short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds 'Shows' tab to a band's Rdio profile page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find out when your favorite bands are playing near you without leaving the Rdio website.

See concert dates, festival dates, show dates for each band on Rdio.
